name: Countries-telephones
tagline: A quick MySQL Database with all countries of the world and all telephony dialling codes and telephone length
body:
### Welcome to this country and telephone library.
Inside the table "countries", you will find :
- the ISO 2-letters country code
- the English CAPITAL-letters country's name
- the official ISO 3-letters currency used in this country
- the international dialling code ("+44" for UK, "+33" for France, "+1" for USA...)
- the trunk prefix : first prefix to dial for normal numbers (it's "0" in most countries)
- the minimum local telephone number length : 014720001 => 10 digits for a local french number

To be used to record nicely telephone numbers in the international form like "+33147200001" when people often enters "01.47.20.00.01".

### Includes the PDO Database library
A quick singleton Database library that uses PHP PDO.

### Authors and Contributors
This library is free to use and to improve, please feel free to comment and improve this simple work for the benefit of everyone.

### Support or Contact
Don't hesitate to contact me via the GitHub form or inside the issues of this repository.

### Sharing is Knowledge
My main goal is to share things that can improve life for everyone.
